page.title: 19HOOK NORTON _ EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Central Stores is one of the 2 thriving village food shops where the owners live above the shop(typical pattern -only 1 exception)We went to interview Mr.Finn, one of the 4 owners. He gets up at 4a.m.Between 4.30-7.30 they tidy up and clean the shop.They open for the sale of newspapers at 7.00a.m. and the rest of the shop at 9.00. During the day. Mr.Finn orders new stock, sells things and prices things. He has no spare time at all. He has been living over the shop and working in it for l3 months.1-2.00p.m.they have dinner.On Saturday afternoons and Sundays the shop is not open but they still keep working.There are 9 workers besides Mr.Finn.Just people from Hook Norton shop there. The shop closes at 5.30p.m.At 7.30 Mr. Finn stops work,has a bath, watches the News and goes to bed.
